name: Waste Odyssey
description:
THE STORY

After waking up R3, a recycler robot, finds himself inexplicably in a mysterious laboratory. He is confused, its gearing hurts, there is nothing and no one around him. He has no idea of what’s happened… The world has been destroyed by a climatic apocalypse, and he realizes his best friend Red isn't next to him anymore. 

What happened?

An SOS message from Red guides him: R3 has to save his friend and the whole world by traveling back in time, and to do that he need to find a quick way to repair the time machine in the lab. 

Will R3 be able to find and recycle the missing parts of the time machine and meet Red again? It’s up to you!

THE GAME

An awesome eye-catching graphic will guide you through the various worlds, where eccentric characters will help you in your quest.

Waste Odyssey is a new game experience developed by 3Revolution Studio.

Travel through time on this graphic adventure game: your skills can change theoutcome of your journey!

Will you be able to save Red?

THE TEAM

Chiara Mele

Game Designer, Programmer and Animator

Margherita Del Balio

Game Designer and Visual Artist

Davide Chemin

Game Designer and Programmer

Francesco Campanaro

Game Designer and Programmer

This project was made for Game Design and Gamification course at the Politecnico di Torino
